articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Thieves looking to score expensive JPEGs have been busy over the last twelve months.
articles.title: Cybercriminals Have Stolen Over $100 Million in NFTs: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Undeterred by an SEC probe, the exchange launches a new utility token before the merge.
articles.title: Coinbase Announces cbETH Wrapped Ethereum Staking Token

articles.description: "Imagine how thin-skinned you have to be to do this," Atozy says, raising $200,000 for his legal defense.
articles.title: Bitboy vs. Atozy: YouTuber Drops Publicly Filed Lawsuit Because It Went Public

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Ethereum Foundation is quadrupling bug bounties ahead of the network’s long-awaited shift to an energy-efficient model.
articles.title: Find an Ethereum Bug Before the Merge? You Could Earn a $1M Reward

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Trabucco is leaving Alameda Research, but admits he “can’t 100% remove” himself from crypto.
articles.title: Alameda Research Co-CEO Sam Trabucco Steps Down to 'Relax'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: John Hopkins crypto researcher Matthew Green wants to preserve the code for the sake of academic research and free speech.
articles.title: Professor Republishes Tornado Cash Code Following GitHub Takedown

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The network’s developers have given dates for when the move to proof of stake will take place.
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation Confirms Date for Long-Awaited Merge Upgrade

articles.description: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.
articles.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: A licensing deal between Mars and music label UMG means Bored Ape NFT images are now printed on M&M’s chocolate candies.
articles.title: These Bored Apes Will Melt in Your Mouth: M&M’s Releases NFT-Inspired Candy

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The stablecoin issuer has yet to receive a request to freeze Tornado Cash-affiliated accounts, but hinted it would comply if it did.
articles.title: Despite US Sanctions, Tether Continues To Support Tornado Cash: Report

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Seven leading digital assets will be available for purchase with cash deposits at 10,000 Coinstar ATMs across the United States.
articles.title: Coinstar Moves Beyond Bitcoin, Adding Dogecoin, Ethereum to ATMs

articles.description: New reports indicate that U.S. Representative Lauren Boebart failed to disclose crypto trades made on Robinhood, violating the STOCK Act.
articles.title: Republican Representative Boebert Failed to Disclose Eight Crypto Trades in 2021

articles.description: Following the first wave of institutional investment in Bitcoin, HNWIs and institutions are exploring the more complex world of decentralized finance.
articles.title: Institutional Investors Are Rediscovering DeFi

articles.description: The social personality Razzlekhan was accused of being a co-conspirator to money laundering in the 2016 Bitfinex $4.5 billion hack.
articles.title: Heather ‘Razzlekhan’ Morgan Breaks Twitter Silence, Denying Links to Crypto, NFT Space

articles.description: As Australian regulators take a closer look at reigning in cryptocurrencies, federal agencies continue to warn of their risks.
articles.title: Australia’s Financial Watchdog Joins Government in Eyeing Fresh Crypto Regulations

articles.description: The OCS is continuing to crack down on unregistered crypto exchanges, warning investors of Kucoin for the second time this August.
articles.title: Ontario Securities Commission Flags Kucoin, Other Crypto Firms as Unregistered

articles.description: 3AC’s liquidators have secured a key court decision to proceed with a further probe into the insolvent crypto hedge fund’s financials.
articles.title: Singapore Court Greenlights Inquiry Into Three Arrows Capital Finances : Report

articles.description: In a new Netflix biopic, McAfee’s former partner Samantha Herrera says the notorious software developer faked his death.
articles.title: John McAfee Is Still Alive, Ex-Girlfriend Claims In Documentary

articles.description: Brian Armstrong wants Coinbase to shed its “U.S. lens” and be “the most regulated” in crypto.

articles.description: The Treasury’s recent ban on Ethereum mixing service Tornado Cash has a U.S. Representative asking tough questions.
articles.title: 'Privacy Is Normal': Rep. Tom Emmer Wants Answers About Tornado Cash Ban

articles.description: Decentralized Pictures aims to use the wisdom of crowds to fund new projects—and has support from Roman Coppola, Kevin Smith, and Steven Soderbergh.
articles.title: How Web3 Can Change Hollywood: Decentralized Pictures CEO

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Bitfinex is courting the possibility of a proof-of-work Ethereum network after the merge and is now offering both ETHW and ETHS tokens.
articles.title: Bitfinex Preps for Merge Eventualities, Offering Ethereum 'Chain Split Tokens'

articles.description: Despite warnings on Crypto Twitter, NFT project SudoRare has disappeared from social media along with more than $800,000 in user funds.
articles.title: NFT Project SudoRare Disappears With Roughly 520 Ethereum in User Funds

articles.description: The number of weekly deposits to Ethereum’s Beacon Chain is at its lowest level ever with just a few more weeks until the merge event.
articles.title: Weekly Ethereum Staking Deposits Hit Record Low Just Weeks Before Merge

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Billionaire investor Mark Cuban took aim at SEC chair Gary Gensler, urging him to publish 'bright line guidelines' for crypto firms to follow.
articles.title: Mark Cuban Slams SEC Chair Gensler's Stance on Crypto

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: The Rainbow Bridge hack over the weekend saw funds returned in 31 seconds with no harm to users, but the attackers lost 5 Ethereum in the process.
articles.title: Near’s Rainbow Bridge Blocks Another Attack, Costing Hackers 5 Ethereum

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Amid a market-wide rout, significant gaming and metaverse tokens are falling harder than most.
articles.title: Metaverse, NFT Tokens Have Plummeted More Than 20% This Week

articles.description: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Javier Milei once called the central bank a “scam.” Now he’s being sued for allegedly promoting a scam of his own.
articles.title: Argentine Presidential Candidate Sued Over Alleged Crypto Ponzi Scheme

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The Pudgy Penguins are seeing big gains as the rarest NFT in the collection sold for over $600,000 Monday.
articles.title: Pudgy Penguins Ethereum NFTs Pump 83% As Meta, Nansen Execs Join Advisory Board

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The new project with Aleph Zero aims to bring elements of Cyberpunk 2077 into an R-rated cosmic horror experience.
articles.title: ‘Witcher’ Animator Launches DRKVRS Game, NFTs to Bridge Cyberpunk With Horror

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The former product manager was in June charged with wire fraud and money laundering. His legal team is now trying to dismiss the case.
articles.title: Ex-OpenSea Exec Argues NFTs Are Not Securities to Dismiss Insider Trading Charges

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Inspired by the $3 million TON domain sale, he wants to “add a little bit of Web 3.0 to Telegram.”
articles.title: Telegram CEO Proposes Auctioning Usernames, Links As NFTs

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The declining NFT market is forcing a lending protocol that leverages them to propose big changes.
articles.title: How Ethereum NFT Lending Service BendDAO Aims to Solve Its Liquidity Crisis

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The Invesco Metaverse Fund will focus on what the firm calls the “Metaverse Value Chain.”
articles.title: Invesco Rolls Out New $30 Million Metaverse Fund

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Crypto regulations will be informed by a phase of comprehensive “token mapping” research, according to Australia’s Treasurer.
articles.title: Australia Unveils Plans for Crypto Regulations Unlike 'Anywhere Else in the World'

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried confirmed media reports of the exchange’s incredible growth during the 2021 bull market.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange FTX's Revenue Soared 1,000% in 2021: Report

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Popular dog-themed meme coins SHIB and Dogecoin have plummeted double-digits over the week as the crypto winter continues.
articles.title: Meme Coins SHIB, Dogecoin Shed Double-Digits Over The Week

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa,Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Bored Apes have been sitting pretty all year, but the CryptoPunks may be seeing a second wind.
articles.title: CryptoPunk Ethereum NFTs Floor Price Flips Bored Apes for First Time in 5 Months

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also, Ukraine’s vice prime minister shared the country’s crypto donation balance sheet since the start of the Russian invasion.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Tornado Cash Crackdown Crashes Crypto Party, North Korean Hackers Post Fake Coinbase Jobs

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt on the Street, reporter Sander Lutz jumps through hoops in the hopes of obtaining an exclusive "NFTiff" from Tiffany & Co. Sander learns manners and spiritual awareness from two coaches, only to fall short of the digital brass ring.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: An NFT Trip to Tiffany's, a Search for Status

articles.description: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is the man of the moment in crypto as he has bailed out multiple insolvent companies. Some are calling him Atlas, some sarcastically calling him savior. Sam answers tough questions from Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on FTX's bailout strategy, the controversial Voyager loan, his market outlook, marketing mistakes by crypto lenders, FTX competitors Binance and Coinbase, his political donations, and what he's learned about management.
articles.title: gm: Sam Bankman-Fried, Crypto Savior?

articles.description: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs

articles.description: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.
articles.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases

articles.description:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash. 

Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.
articles.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya

articles.description: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.
articles.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
